description: Image contains one or more Magic: The Gathering cards.
Image displays a post on a social media platform.
Image displays a song or album.
Image displays a simple handy screenshot of the main screen or settings.
Image contains bottom tabs "Start" "Verlauf" "Versorgung" "Mehr" or "Start" "History" "Care" "More" or an error message.
Image of a ticket, barcode or QR-code to an event or tour.
Image of one or more people who are the main focus of the image.
Image is not matching other categories.
